query.name: org.billingsschools.midas.enrollments
query.sql:
with config as ( select t.yearid from terms t where t.id = (extract(year from sysdate) + case when extract(month from sysdate) >= 7 then 1 else 0 end - 1991) * 100 and t.schoolid = 0 and t.isyearrec = 1 )
select students.psguid "user_id" , abs(cc.sectionid) "section_id" , '0' "is_teacher" , case when cc.sectionid > 0 and cc.dateleft > sysdate then '1' when cc.sectionid > 0 and terms.lastday < sysdate then '3' when cc.sectionid < 0 then '2' else '???' end "status_id" , to_char(cc.dateenrolled, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "entry_date" , to_char(cc.dateleft - 1, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "exit_date" from cc left join courses on courses.course_number = cc.course_number left join sections on sections.id = abs(cc.sectionid) left join terms on terms.id = sections.termid and terms.schoolid = sections.schoolid left join students on students.id = cc.studentid where floor(cc.termid / 100) = (select yearid from config)
union all
select s_mt_usr_x.seid "user_id" , sections.id , '1' "is_teacher" , '1' "status_id" , to_char(terms.firstday, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "entry_date" , to_char(terms.lastday, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "exit_date" from sections left join schoolstaff on schoolstaff.id = sections.teacher left join terms on terms.id = sections.termid and terms.schoolid = sections.schoolid left join users on users.dcid = schoolstaff.users_dcid left join s_mt_usr_x on s_mt_usr_x.usersdcid = users.dcid where floor(sections.termid / 100) = (select yearid from config)
